input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Team AMANI Pro Team Aero Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTC Jersey C2'
  - Name='Assos UMA GT Jersey C2 EVO Women's'
  - Name='Men's Attack Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Assos UMA GT Jersey Women's S11'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Summit Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Summit Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Evade Pro Base 2.0 Short-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='SMS Santini Men's Texas Roadhouse Lightweight Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Breathable Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Alt_Road Half Zip Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Trek Factory Team Issue Long Sleeve Thermal Jersey + Bib Tights'
  - Name='Santini Sensation Unisex Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Ascent Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Luce Unisex Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Training Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Relaxed Fit Bike Jersey'
  - Name='men Santini La Vuelta Cuito Negru 2024 Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Gravel Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Gravel Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='PRO Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Canyon Short Sleeve Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Team AMANI Pro Team Aero Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are high-performance cycling jerseys designed with aerodynamic fit and advanced materials, targeting serious cyclists alike.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTC Jersey C2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium cycling jersey with focus on comfort and performance compression, similar function and quality to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos UMA GT Jersey C2 EVO Women's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality women's cycling jersey focusing on fit and performance like the reference, though gender specific.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Attack Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey of similar category but long-sleeve design differs from the short-sleeve reference product's lightweight construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos UMA GT Jersey Women's S11
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another premium women's cycling jersey with performance and comfort features akin to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal and long sleeve jersey for cooler conditions, differing in use case from the lightweight, short sleeve, temperature-regulating reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Summit Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve, performance cycling jersey aimed at similar casual to pro cyclists, with moisture management and comfort features expected.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Summit Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aerodynamic, short sleeve, high-quality cycling jersey with technical fabrics, closely aligned to the reference's function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Evade Pro Base 2.0 Short-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight, form-fitting cycling jersey with moisture-wicking tech and pockets, very similar in function and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SMS Santini Men's Texas Roadhouse Lightweight Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight cycling jersey designed for comfort and breathability, similar construction though branding and style may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Breathable Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly breathable and mesh construction for ventilation, somewhat more specialized and different in fabric emphasis than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above, ultra-light and mesh design provides excellent breathability but less compression and durability focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Alt_Road Half Zip Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical road cycling jersey with half zip and form-fitting design, matches core features though zip style differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Trek Factory Team Issue Long Sleeve Thermal Jersey + Bib Tights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve thermal jersey with bib tights included, intended for colder conditions and a different product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Sensation Unisex Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve unisex cycling jersey focusing on comfort and performance, very similar in purpose and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Ascent Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance-oriented aero short sleeve jersey with technical fabrics and pockets, closely matching core jersey features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Luce Unisex Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve design changes intended use scenario; less relevant to short sleeve lightweight reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Training Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed for training rides, likely similar construction and comfort focus as the reference Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Relaxed Fit Bike Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey but with a relaxed fit, likely less compression and tailored fit than reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Santini La Vuelta Cuito Negru 2024 Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Event/team short sleeve cycling jersey, similar short sleeve and lightweight features but possibly less focused on sustainable materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Gravel Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mesh ultra-light jersey tailored to gravel riding; similar in lightweight aspects but differing in fabric emphasis and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Gravel Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey optimized for gravel riding; functionally similar in fit and pockets, close to reference features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PRO Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic pro-level cycling jersey, likely similar function and construction though details are sparse.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve design focused on different conditions, less relevant to short-sleeve reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Canyon Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve technical cycling jersey offering performance features and similar fit, closely matching reference product.
